name: Pumpkin in the Forest
description:
Curiosity got the better of Pumpkin one day, resulting in an easier-than-expected escape from his cage. While exploring, he found a bag of his favorite treats and dove in. Suddenly, the bag was lifted and after what felt like hours to Pumpkin, the bag made contact with solid ground. 

Help Pumpkin the gerbil make his way back home! Pumpkin is lost in the forest and needs your help getting home. Jump, craft, and make your way through different puzzles as you explore the forest. Meet cute, helpful woodland creatures, as well as some less helpful ones that act as obstacles along the way. Outthink and outsmart the Order of Enigma. 

Set in a vibrant forest with a 2.5-D art style, Pumpkin in the Forest features an original score and a fun, platforming, puzzle-filled adventure for all.

Pumpkin

Pumpkin was born in the Best Furrends Forever Pet Store. Shortly after his birth, he was adopted by a young couple who lived on the edge of town, near Trunabbot Forest.

Lesley

Lesley was born and raised in Trunabbot Forest. Ever since Lesley was a young squirrel, she had been fascinated with the strange tall animals that lived on the edge of the forest.  One fateful day, a nearby house with which Lesley often observed brought home a tiny, squirrel-like critter.

The Order of Enigma

The big baddies who linger in the Depths of Trunabbot Forest are spreading out to the surface, influencing those who already reside throughout Trunabbot. Comprised of multiple species and spearheaded by Enigma-- Trunabbot Forest's King of the Shadows.
